Normal Outcome

Thevaa Chandereng, Donald Musgrove, Tarek Haddad, Graeme Hickey, Timothy Hanson, Theodore Lystig

Source: vignettes/normal.Rmd
normal.Rmd
library(bayesCT)
value <-
  normal_outcome(mu_control = 16, mu_treatment = 13,
                 sd_treatment = 1.4, sd_control = 1.9) %>%
  historical_normal(mu0_treatment = 13, sd0_treatment = 2, N0_treatment = 100,
                    mu0_control = 12, sd0_control = 3, N0_control = 120, 
                    discount_function = "weibull", alpha_max = F, fix_alpha = 1,
                    weibull_scale = 0.135, weibull_shape = 3) %>%
  enrollment_rate(lambda = c(0.3, 1), time = 25) %>%
  study_details(total_sample_size = 300, study_period = 50,
                interim_look = c(210, 240, 270),
                prop_loss_to_followup = 0.10) %>%
  impute(no_of_impute = 25, number_mcmc = 1000) %>%
  randomize(block_size = 2, randomization_ratio = c(1, 1)) %>%
  hypothesis(delta = 0, futility_prob = 0.05, prob_accept_ha = 0.95,
             expected_success_prob = 0.90, alternative = "less") %>%
  BACTnormal(no_of_sim = 5)


str(value)
#> List of 7
#>  $ power                       :'data.frame':    4 obs. of  2 variables:
#>   ..$ interim_looks: num [1:4] 210 240 270 300
#>   ..$ power        : num [1:4] 1 1 1 1
#>  $ type1_error                 : num 0
#>  $ est_final                   : num [1:5] -3.57 -3.04 -3.32 -2.8 -2.83
#>  $ post_prob_accept_alternative: num [1:5] 1 1 1 1 1
#>  $ N_enrolled                  : num [1:5] 210 210 210 210 210
#>  $ stop_expect_success         : num [1:5] 1 1 1 1 1
#>  $ stop_futility               : num [1:5] 0 0 0 0 0
data(normaldata)

value1 <-
  data_normal(data = normaldata) %>%
  historical_normal(mu0_treatment = 13, sd0_treatment = 2, N0_treatment = 100,
                    mu0_control = 12, sd0_control = 3, N0_control = 120, 
                    discount_function = "weibull", alpha_max = F, fix_alpha = 1,
                    weibull_scale = 0.135, weibull_shape = 3) %>%
  impute(no_of_impute = 25, number_mcmc = 1000) %>%
  hypothesis(delta = 0, futility_prob = 0.05, prob_accept_ha = 0.95,
             expected_success_prob = 0.90, alternative = "less") %>%
  BACTnormal_analysis()


str(value1)

#>  $ prob_of_accepting_alternative: num 0.95
